title: Strengthening Scientific Ethical Competencies Through Problem-Based Moral Education

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in scientific fields and understanding of basic ethical concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training for corporate science practitioners to resolve moral dilemmas

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain moral issues that may arise in scientific research and practical processes through case analysis.
Learners can propose alternative solutions to scientific ethical conflict situations through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can reflect on the importance of scientific responsibility by experiencing the moral decision-making process in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
